trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para os componentes que fornecem suporte de tempo de criação num anfitrião estruturador para servidor Web controla que são derivados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Num anfitrião estruturador, quando o utilizador muda de origem para a vista de estrutura, o código de origem do markup que descreve um controlo derivado o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe abstrata é analisada e uma versão de tempo de criação do controlo é criada na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador mudar para vista de origem, o controlo de tempo de criação é transferido para o código de origem do markup e editá-lo na marcação de página Web.

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: A classe abstrata BaseDataListDesigner funciona como uma classe base para os componentes que fornecem suporte de momento da conceção para controlos que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>num anfitrião estruturador.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de classe BaseDataListDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade devolve um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que contém, geralmente, um objeto que é derivado de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A>propriedades fornecem acesso às propriedades correspondentes do controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>propriedade fornece acesso para o Estruturador da origem de dados de controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>propriedade obtém a vista predefinida da origem de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos de classe BaseDataListDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o estruturador para ver, editar e criar o controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>método invoca um editor do componente para o controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método é utilizado para adicionar, remover ou sombra propriedades do tempo de criação do controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>método gera um objeto que pode ser utilizado como uma origem de dados no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>método obtém a origem de dados do contentor do controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>método obtém a origem de dados a partir do contentor de controlo, resolvido para um membro de dados específicos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>método obtém a origem de dados do contentor do modelo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>método é chamado quando existe uma alteração para o controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>método é chamado quando a origem de dados de controlo associado foi alterada.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>método é chamado quando altera o esquema da origem de dados de controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>método será chamado sempre que tenha sido aplicado um esquema de formatação automático.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A>métodos que podem ser substituídos para implementar funcionalidades que devem ocorrer quando um estilo de controlo associado foi alterado ou quando tem alterado os estruturador verbos de edição do modelo, respetivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>método processa o evento de construtor de propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework constrói internamente uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>Quando cria o controlo associado que é derivado de classe a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe ou uma cópia desse controlo na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação de estruturador para neste estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the ActionLists base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActionLists cria vazio <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>de objeto e adiciona o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>que é devolvido pela propriedade base ActionLists este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adiciona-o para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>de objeto e, em seguida, devolve isto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado neste estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data key field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do campo de chave de dados do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The DataKeyField property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataKeyField fornece acesso a partir do designer para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>propriedade do controlo associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>indica a chave primária da origem de dados que está vinculada ao controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>valor do controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data member field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do campo de membro de dados do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataMember fornece acesso a partir do designer para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>propriedade do controlo associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>indica a tabela ou o elemento da origem de dados que está vinculado ao controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>valor do controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data source property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da propriedade da origem de dados de controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de origem de dados fornece acesso a partir do designer para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>propriedade do controlo associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>valor do controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o Estruturador da origem de dados, quando um é selecionado para o enlace de dados.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DataSourceDesigner devolve o estruturador para a origem de dados do controlo associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: O objeto do estruturador implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O estruturador para a origem de dados do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a versão do designer de propriedade de ID de origem de dados e é utilizado para a propriedade correspondente do controlo associado de sombra.

trans-unit.source: Setting the designer's DataSourceID property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control to be set.
trans-unit.target: Definição causas de propriedade de DataSourceID o estruturador de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do controlo associado seja definida.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o DataSourceID estiver definido como um <xref:System.String>, que indica uma nova origem de dados está a ser definido um **criar origem de dados** é apresentada a caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Se o DataSourceID estiver definido como um <xref:System.String>que indica que não há nenhuma origem de dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>está definido como uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the data source ID of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que é o ID de origem de dados do controlo associado.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a vista predefinida da origem de dados que está vinculada ao controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerView property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de presença de DesignerView obtém a vista predefinida da origem de dados que está vinculada ao controlo associado transferindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>método do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.
trans-unit.target: Não se for devolvida nenhum vista ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>propriedade não for definida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>método o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>é utilizado para obter a vista nomes e o primeiro nome de vista é utilizado para obter a vista predefinida.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> que representa a vista predefinida da origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos que são utilizados pelo estruturador e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the Dispose method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: Se associada controlar o que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe tem um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>propriedade que implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>interface, o método de Dispose desliga o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>eventos do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the Dispose disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>método, o Dispose desliga o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>eventos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: O Dispose também desliga o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>eventos do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: It finally calls the Dispose base method.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, aquele invoca o método base Dispose.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera um objeto que pode ser utilizado como uma origem de dados no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeDataSource tenta construir um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objeto da origem de dados que é definido pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Se não for possível, cria um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>dos dados fictícias.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de linhas de dados de exemplo que deve conter a origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a origem de dados devolvidos contém dados fictícias; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a origem de dados devolvidos contém dados a partir de uma origem de dados real.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface que funciona como uma origem de dados para utilização no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera um objeto que pode ser utilizado como uma origem de dados no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is specified by the `selectedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeDataSource tenta construir um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objeto da origem de dados que é especificado pelo `selectedDataSource` parâmetro.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Se não for possível, cria um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>dos dados fictícias.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that is used as a template for the data format.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>que é utilizado como um modelo para o formato dos dados.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source data should contain.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de linhas de dados de exemplo que devem conter os dados de origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a origem de dados devolvidos contém dados fictícias; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a origem de dados devolvidos contém dados a partir de uma origem de dados real.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface que funciona como uma origem de dados para utilização no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente de origem de dados a partir do contentor do controlo associado, resolvido para um membro de dados específicos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>método utiliza o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>método para construir uma origem de dados do objeto que é especificado pela <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>as propriedades do controlo associado derivados de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> of the associated control, resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface que contém o momento da conceção <> </> *> do controlo associado, resolvido para o <> </> *> parâmetro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não for encontrada uma origem de dados.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente de origem de dados a partir do contentor de controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The GetSelectedDataSource method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O método de GetSelectedDataSource utiliza o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para construir uma origem de dados do objeto que é especificado pela <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>propriedade de controlo associado derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property of the associated control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface que contém o momento da conceção <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>propriedade do controlo associado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não for encontrada uma origem de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source of the template's container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a origem de dados do contentor do modelo.

trans-unit.source: The GetTemplateContainerDataSource method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O método GetTemplateContainerDataSource chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>método para construir uma origem de dados do objeto que é especificado pela <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>as propriedades do controlo associado derivados de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the template for which to get the data source.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que especifica o nome do modelo para o qual obter a origem de dados.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing a design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interface que contém um momento da conceção <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o estruturador para ver, editar e criar o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião estruturador chama o método de inicialização quando estiver pronto para utilizar o estruturador para compor o controlo que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método de inicialização e os respetivos métodos base configurar propriedades e ligar os eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The Initialize connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: A inicializar estabelece ligação à origem de dados de tempo de criação e a marcação de tempo de criação de atualizações.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, the Initialize connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>propriedade implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>interface, a inicializar liga o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>eventos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o controlo, derivado o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, que é associado este designer ou uma cópia desse controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo é derivado de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref>, que implementa um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a component editor for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Invoca um editor do componente para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The InvokePropertyBuilder method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: O método InvokePropertyBuilder cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>de objeto e, em seguida, invoca o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>método do editor do componente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
trans-unit.target: O índice da página com o qual ao inicializar o editor do componente.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Processa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormat method is obsolete and has no functionality.
trans-unit.target: O método OnAutoFormat está obsoleto e não tenha nenhuma funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>gerado que o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando foi aplicado um esquema de formatação automático para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormatApplied method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O método de OnAutoFormatApplied é chamado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>objeto é aplicado ao controlo associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>objeto define um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle>objeto que é aplicado ao controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>

trans-unit.source: A designer can override the OnAutoFormatApplied to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.
trans-unit.target: Um designer pode substituir o OnAutoFormatApplied inspecionar as propriedades do controlo ou para tomar qualquer outra ação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"></xref> object that defines a style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"> </xref> objeto que define um estilo.

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando existe uma alteração para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes.
trans-unit.target: O método OnComponentChanged é chamado quando a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>eventos de um controlo que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe executa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, trata-se em resposta a uma alteração de propriedade no controlo (por exemplo, um **propriedades** alteração de grelha).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>objeto ao qual o controlo está vinculado é alterado, o controlo é redesenhado na superfície do design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que é a origem do evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a origem de dados para o controlo associado foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O método base OnDataSourceChanged liga-se de que é derivado do controlo associado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe para a origem de dados atual, e se o que é diferente da origem de dados ao qual o controlo foi ligado, o método atualiza a marcação de momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que processa o evento de construtor de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyBuilder method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPropertyBuilder invoca um editor do componente para o controlo associado que é derivado da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>de objeto e, em seguida, invoca o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>método do editor do componente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que é a origem do evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando altera o esquema da origem de dados para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o estruturador está no modo de edição do modelo ou um campo está a ser adicionado ou editado, as chamadas de método OnSchemaRefreshed o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>método, o que por sua vez chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>método para atualizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>controlo para refletir a alteração da origem de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser substituído para implementar funcionalidades que devem ocorrer quando um estilo do controlo associado foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The OnStylesChanged method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.
trans-unit.target: O método OnStylesChanged pode servir como notificação que um estilo de associada controla que é derivada de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe foi alterada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser substituído para implementar funcionalidades que devem ocorrer quando os verbos de edição do modelo estruturador foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: The OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.
trans-unit.target: O método de OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged pode ser implementado para efetuar o processamento adicional, tal gravar que ocorreu uma alteração tem, quando alterar os verbos de edição do modelo.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado pelo estruturador para remover propriedades de ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para apresentar no **propriedades** grelha ou às propriedades de sombra de volumes de controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers controlo utilizam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para funcionar como sombra várias propriedades de controlo com propriedades correspondentes do tempo de criação que implementa o estruturador, e para adicionar propriedades ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grelha.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the PreFilterProperties creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para os controlos que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe, o PreFilterProperties cria propriedades do momento da conceção para sombra o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Implementar uma coleção um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>interface das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição deste membro, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o esquema pode ser atualizado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to disable data-binding events until after the schema has been refreshed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para desativar o enlace de dados de eventos até após o esquema ter sido atualizada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para ativar os eventos.
